description: Queries a database with the given SQL query and returns the result.

sql_query.description: The SQL query to execute (e.g., 'SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1').

description: Calls a REST API endpoint with the given parameters and returns the JSON response.

url.description: The full URL of the API endpoint.

headers.description: Optional HTTP headers as key-value pairs.

body.description: Optional JSON body for POST or PUT requests.

description: Scrapes textual content from a given URL.

url.description: The URL of the webpage to scrape.
